mapper.select: select IFNULL(SUM(IF(`type` = '${@com.huhuhu.project.enums.DownloadSearchRecordEnum@DOWNLOAD.getDesc()}',1,0)), 0) as downloadCount, IFNULL(SUM(IF(`type` = '${@com.huhuhu.project.enums.DownloadSearchRecordEnum@SEARCH.getDesc()}',1,0)), 0) as searchCount from dtt_doc_download_record where create_time between #{lastTime} and #{currentTime} and user_id = #{userId}
